READ ME: Cloud Infratructure Checks and Variables - Take the data from here to build your audit and variable data
READ_MORE: Scraped from an IO scan creation to get the data.  See aws3TL1WFL1Template.json for example use

inputs.name: Regions to access
inputs.hint: Credentials for the GovCloud or China Regions cannot be used to access other regions, and vice versa.

inputs.name: Subscription IDs
inputs.hint: List subscription IDs to scan, separated by a comma. If this field is blank, all subscriptions will be audited.

inputs.name: Security Compliance Notification Email
inputs.hint: The email address that will be used to notifiy the organization in the event of a security incident.

inputs.name: Security Compliance Notification Phone
inputs.hint: The phone number that will be used to notifiy the organization in the event of a security incident.

inputs.name: Server Owner Username
inputs.hint: This 'Server Owner Username' variable is used in the audit to query for servers owned by a specific username.

inputs.name: LB Algorithm
inputs.hint: The algorithm used by the LoadBalancers

inputs.name: Role Name for User List
inputs.hint: This is the role name (regex) used in searching for and listing out a list of users with that role assigned to them

inputs.name: Days since the last Nessus scan
inputs.hint: This is a 'Days Since' value for Nessus Scans. This will be used in determining Servers, DB backups, Domains and LBs created or updated within 'VALUE' amount of days

inputs.name: DBC Var - max_user_connections
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'max_user_connections' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: DBC Var - max_connections
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'max_connections' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: DBC Var - max_allowed_packet
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'max_allowed_packet' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: DBC Var - max_connect_errors
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'max_connect_errors' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: DBC Var - wait_timeout
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'wait_timeout' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: DBC Var - sql_mode
inputs.hint: This is the value of the parameter 'sql_mode' as used in database configuration templates

inputs.name: Start IP
inputs.hint: This is the start IP of the address range from where users are allowed to login to SalesForce.com

inputs.name: End IP
inputs.hint: This is the end IP of the address range from where users are allowed to login to SalesForce.com

inputs.name: Chatter Mobile
inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile be enabled

inputs.name: CM Push Notification
inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile push notifications be enabled

inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile be enabled for iPad

inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile be enabled for iPhone

inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile be enabled for Android

inputs.name: CM Blackberry
inputs.hint: Should Chatter Mobile be enabled for Blackberry

inputs.hint: Should Dashboard Mobile be enabled for iPad

inputs.hint: Should Mobile Lite be enabled

inputs.hint: Should the TouchMobile Browser access be enabled

inputs.name: TM iPad App
inputs.hint: Should the TouchMobile iPad App access be enabled

inputs.name: TM iPhone App
inputs.hint: Should the TouchMobile iPhone App access be enabled

inputs.name: Nessus Scan Interval
inputs.hint: This is the Nessus scan interval used for finding new users created since the last scan.

inputs.name: Known Administrators
inputs.hint: This is the list of approved administrators used to find accounts created by unauthorized users.

inputs.name: PW Change Interval
inputs.hint: This is the value for number of days between required password changes.

inputs.name: Chatter Facebook SSO
inputs.hint: Should Facebook SSO be enabled for Chatter Answers

inputs.name: Facebook SSO Prov
inputs.hint: What Facebook SSO authentication provider should be used
